name: Rollers' Keep
description:
Objective: Defeat your opponent by rolling a higher number. For every enemy you defeat they get stronger, however you get to choose a dice to counteract their strength. Collect the right dice to create synergies and become untouchable. 

This was created for the 2021 version of the 7 Day Rouge Like game jam. We worked on the project consistently for 4 days (full time jobs for the 3 days prior to our weekend). 

Leave a comment and let us know what you think. We are planning on continuing this project and adding more complex mechanics.

Programming done by Joshua Hames

Art Direction done by Sara Hames
